name: The Crossing (itch) (aguichet)
description:
My very first game, it's about the people who risk their lives trying to cross the sea...

Controls : 

Move : AWSD - Arrow key

Hope you'll enjoy it.

This game has been made as a personal project during the end of my 3 months Unity Training at the 3W Academy.

Skills used in the making of this game includes :

- State Machines

- 2D PathFinding

- Unity Events

- Scriptable Objects

- Object Pooling

- 2D Lighting

- Procedural Level Design

- Animator Controller and events

- Player Prefs
